name: Flower Valley
description:
Help your neighbors and find the truth about your life

You wake up in a bed you don't recognize, on a house you don't recognize, with a man staring at you you don't recognize. He informs you that your life as a part of the Flower Valley has just begun and that you must help the villagers with their chores.

 What secrets does this valley hold? Are the other villagers just like you?

This game was made for an academic project, If you'd like to help with this project please take a little of your time to fill out the following form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfkSaTgIVAvCLzao1qlnsQiCBH6V31KrAfB-gm0...

Game features
  • Intriguing story
  • Unique gameboy horror visuals
  • Unique character dialogue
Controls
  • "Z" for interacting and talking
  • WASD/Arrow Keys for walking
Assets
  • GB Studio Community Assets
Credits
